settings.title: CURATED WORKS — STRAIGHT TO YOUR INBOX
settings.subheading: Tell us which artists are on your radar, and we’ll keep you in the loop about upcoming collaborations and more. Reveal 10% off coupon code by entering your email.

settings.question: HOW IS MY ORDER PACKAGED?
settings.answer: Your artwork will be encased in specialized packaging, designed for safe transit. A Certificate of Authenticity (if applicable) is included within the box, and external labels indicate necessary customs documentation.

settings.question: WHERE ARE THE ARTWORKS SHIPPED FROM?
settings.answer: Artworks are dispatched directly from our locations in the US, UK or Europe.

settings.question: WHAT IS THE ESTIMATED DELIVERY TIME?
settings.answer: Utilizing our standard shipping service with globally recognized carriers, most artworks are delivered within 7-15 business days, subject to location variables.

settings.question: ARE ANY OF YOUR PRINTS SIGNED OR NUMBERED?
settings.answer: On occasion we release signed and numbered editions that often sell out immediately. The best way to stay informed is by signing up for our newsletter and following us on social media.

settings.question: ARE YOUR PRINTS GLOSSY OR MATTE IN FINISH?
settings.answer:
Each museum-quality Giclee Fine Art Print is part of our Premier collection and is available as an open edition for a limited time. Printed and framed locally in the USA, UK or Germany on medium gloss, artist-grade, acid-free 300gsm photo paper using archival inks. All our artworks are made-to-order specifically for you.

The Fuji Crystal Archive Pearl paper has a rich metallic base. The colours have a reflective, metallic and 3-dimensional feel which creates a distinctive pearl-like appearance. High mid-tones & highlights add luminosity & iridescence which lends this paper to artworks that want to accentuate warmth and depth of colour.

settings.question: DO YOU OFFER A TRADE PROGRAM?
settings.answer: Yes, we work closely with many interior design and hospitality groups. Please get in touch if you would like to work together. Check it here.

settings.question: I AM AN ARTIST, HOW DO I WORK WITH COLLECTED CLUB?
settings.answer: Our team of curators meets monthly to review new artist submissions. Please send over a pdf of five image selects from your portfolio that you consider suitable additions to our collection using the contact us page. Unfortunately due to the volume of inquiries we receive we are unable to respond to everyone.
